item_desc4JP.	\t\t…‚ğ’X‚¦‚éİ”õBˆù‚Ş‚±‚Æ‚ªo—ˆ‚éB\n#`ŠÓ’è•ñ‘Fƒİ”õ„ƒJƒeƒSƒŠ`\n
item_desc1EN.	\t\tAn installation that provides fresh drinking water, vital for the citizens. Though it offers a place for women to gather and socialize, North Tyris has rather poor water purification technology, thus drinking the water can often bring about trouble.\n#~Side Characters of the City~\n
item_desc2EN.	
item_desc3EN.	
item_desc4EN.	\t\tFull of water. You can drink from it.
item_desc1EN.	\t\tAn installation that provides fresh drinking water, vital for the citizens. Though it offers a place for women to gather and socialize, North Tyris has rather poor water purification technology, thus drinking the water can often bring about trouble.\n#~Side Characters of the City~\n
item_desc2EN.	
item_desc3EN.	
item_desc4EN.	\t\tFull of water. You can drink from it.
